metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000367 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description:
Todd Miller's sudo version 1.8.20 and earlier is vulnerable to an input validation (embedded spaces) in the get_process_ttyname() function resulting in information disclosure and command execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.4
sudo-ldap - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> code to parse /proc/pid/stat and walk /dev is not present in precise

criterions.comment: sudo package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1.4').
